participant_1.background:
I enjoy spending time in my garden, tending to my plants and watching them grow.
I wake up early to get a head start on my day, and I make sure to schedule time for soccer practice and spending time with my kids.
I am more concerned with my creations than my appearance.
I enjoy exercising and try to work out as often as I can, but it can be hard to find the time, especially with my night shift schedule.
I'm a musician who recently became truthful with my coach

participant_2.background:
My family is supportive and understanding, even though they don't know about my love life.
i have 4 dogs.
I'm not really one for relationships, but my dog has been with me for 10 years.
I enjoy listening to the blues while wearing my hunter green suit.
I enjoy the creativity of Halloween and the joy of weddings.

content.text: Good! Just got back from a busy day at work, and looking forward to relaxing with my dogs.
Nice! I love dogs, I have four of my own.
Oh wow, that's a lot of dogs! What are their names?
Their names are Buddy, Shadow, Max, and Rocky.
Those are great names! I'm sure they're all very well-behaved.
They are, thanks! They're great companions.
I'm sure they are. I love having dogs around. They're so calming and relaxing.
So what do you do for a living?
I'm a musician, I play the blues.
Oh cool! I love the blues. What kind of music do you play?
I play a lot of different styles of blues, but my favorite is Chicago blues.
Nice! I love Chicago blues. What's your favorite blues song?
That's a tough question, but I'd have to say "Hoochie Coochie Man" by Muddy Waters.
That's a great song! I love that one too
